mapper.select: SELECT r.board_no AS boardNo, r.member_id AS memberId, r.board_title AS boardTitle, r.board_content AS boardContent, r.mv_no AS mvNo, r.reg_date AS regDate, m.title AS movieTitle FROM rvboard r LEFT JOIN movies m ON r.mv_no = m.tmdb_id ORDER BY r.board_no DESC

SELECT r.board_no AS boardNo, r.member_id AS memberId, r.board_title AS boardTitle, r.board_content AS boardContent, r.mv_no AS mvNo, r.reg_date AS regDate, m.title AS movieTitle FROM rvboard r LEFT JOIN movies m ON r.mv_no = m.tmdb_id WHERE r.board_no = #{boardNo}
